sentences: Thomas Neil Guay (born October 11, 1965), more commonly known by his stage name Tom Five (or Tom 5), is an American guitar player who joined White Zombie while studying art at Parsons School of Design which he attended from 1985 to 1989.
He played guitar for the metal band Angel Rot from 1988 to 2003, releasing the album Unlistenable Hymns of Indulgent Damage in 1999.
He currently plays guitar for the Los Angeles band Triple T.
